chapter.text: Caa-Miim- (edde faxem Yalli yaaxige)
Yalli baxxaqqa-le kitaabal xiibiteh (Qhuraan kinnuk)
Diggah Nanu kaa oobisneh barkat-le barat (leylatul kadri bar), diggah Nanu meesiisá (kadisa) kinninoomul (Qhuraanal)
Woo barih (leylatil kadri baray ramadaan barittek barak teynat geytima kinnuk) addat ummaan caagidiy karriqqa-le meklima
Tamah Ni-xaquuk yan caagidi, diggah Nanu farmoytit ruubá kinnino
Tamah ku-Rabbik xuwaawa nabiyow, diggah usuk yaabbi, yaaxigi
Qaranwaa kee baaxooy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi kinni nummah yasmite mara tekkeenik
Yallak sah cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayan Usuk yaynuwweeh qidaah sin Rabbiiy, siinik naharsi abbobtih Rabbi kinnik kaa inkittoysaay kaa uqbuda sinaamey
Tonna hinnay usun (koros kinnuk) cakkik agay-waagah addat anuk digran
Toysa keenih qambal nabiyow qaran qeltu (qellu) sinni qer baahuwaa saaku
Woo qer sinam buulaah, tah qansarissa digaalá keenik iyyan
Ni-Rabbow digaalá nek kal, diggah nanu aaminenno digaalá nek kaltek iyyan
Yallih digaalá keenil obtek wadir kassit anninnal keenih yakkeeh nummah baxxaqqa iyya farmoytay (Nabii Mucammad åz;afeio kinnuk) baxxaqqa iyya diinil rubsume keenih amaatuk
Tohuk wadir derre kaat cabeeniih (koros kinnuk), usuk farmoyta hinna seehada barisse cabulikkal kaak iyyen
Diggaluk Nanu digaalá dagooh gide fayya siinik heenno immay, diggah isin edde sugten koroosannuh aduuretton
Nabiyow kassis koros inkih kaxxa digaaláh edde digaallu waynaah, diggah nanu cane keenil edde gacisnu wayna ayró. (qhħiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Nummah keenik (Makki koros kinnuk) duma firqawnaa kee firqawni mara niqiyyireeh massakaxxa-le farmoyti keenih yemeete (Nabii Muusa kinnuk)
Nabii Muusa Yallih naqoosa yol tabisa diggah anu siinih amaanat-le farmoyta kinniyok keenik iyye
Kaadu Yallal makaxxa-mariinitina, diggaluk anu baxxaqqa-le sumaq siinih baaheyyo kay farmoyta kinniyoomuh
Kaadu anu diggaluk yi-Rabbiiy sin- Rabbi kinni Rabbi eleelita xeetit yoo qiddaanamak
Kaadu yoo nummayse wayteenik, toysa anay yoo ixxicaay, adá yoo abtaanamak yok exxeera
Tokkel Nabii Muusa isi Rabbih seeceh firqawnaa kee firqawni mara kaa dirabbosse waqdi, diggah a-mari uma maray Yallal koroosite axcuk
Toysa Muusaw yi-naqoosak koo nummayse mara barat kuulus, diggah firqawnaa kee firqawni mari sin katayeloonuk kaak iyye Yalli
Kaadu bad baxsimit edde cab saayah anuk, diggah usun macaxuy badat yanxuqsumuwaa kinnoonuk kaak iyye Yalli
Makinam cabeeniih firqawnaa kee firqawni mari busaatin kee daroorik badat finqiteeniik lakal
Kaadu usun buqreeraa kee meqé aroocak makinam cabeeniih
Kaadu niqmatittey ruffu edde axcuk sugeenik makinam caben
Tonnaah, aki-mara tet (niqmatitte kinnuk) nagarsisne (israa-iil xaylo kinnuk)
Tokkel qaran kee baaxó keenih (firqawnaa kee firqawni mara kinnuk) maweeqinnaay, digaalák mohlá kah yeceen mara makkon
Yalli nummah xiibiteh israa-iil xaylo rammissah tan digaalák ken naggoyseemil
Yalli Firqawni keenit abak suge digaalák ken cateh. Diggaluk usuk (firqawna kinnuk) jabbiiriy nacrur sinniy kaxxa-mariinoh caddok taturleelat yanik suge
Yalli nummah xiibiteh israa-iil xaylo ken waktih marak aaxaguk ken doorre axcuk
Kaadu keenih neceeh astootik baxxaqqa- le aqayyaare edde tanim Nabii Muusâ gabal
Diggaluk nabiyow a-mari (Makki koros kinnuk) iyyah
Rabi mayan addunyal abne naharsi raba akke waytek, kaadu nanu rabneek lakal ugsuma mara hinnino qhiyaamah ayró
Toysa Mucammadow koo kee kol yeemene mara ni-abbobtiy rabte baahay, ittaanamal numma-le mara tekkeenik iyyan
Caylah usun (Makki koros kinnuk) yayseeni innaa? hinnay Tubbaq maraa kee keenik naharat suge mari yaysee? ken finqisnehik diggah usun umá marah sugeenimih sabbatah
Qaranwaa kee baaxooy, ken nammayih fanal tanim digirih ma- gininnino iyye Yalli
Ken nammay (qaranwaa kee baaxó kinnuk) ma-gininnino cakkil ken ginnem akke waytek, kinnih immay keenik (koros kinnuk) maggo mari woh mayaaxiga
Diggah meklah ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) inkih keenik xagni ayró
Woh xayni-xaynah tu-xiqewaah, kataysa-kataysah tu-xiqewaa ayroóy, usun ken cattam malon
Yalli kah racmate num akke waytek (moomintu kinnuk), diggaluk yalli mayso-li, xuwaw-li
Diggah Zaqhqhuum deqsitta caxáy Jahannamak addak tawqe
Tet mexexi kaxxa-dambi-li (korosta kinnuk) maaqó
Eelisen (diyaayisen) nacaasih innah ken (koros kinnuk) bagul faca (goomaaxa)
Niqna kak caddok taturte leeh faciyyih innah faca ken bagul
A-kaxxa dambiliy umeynah yani ibbixaay, hirriigisak kaa beya jaciim deqsitta girák gudê fan, iyyan malaykak
Tohuk wadir amok kaal caxa niqná kak caddok taturte leeh digaalá
Tammos tama digaalá, diggaluk atu mayso-le konnaba-li kinnitok kaak iyyan anqasah
Diggaluk tamah agay-waaga kak luk sugten digaalák, tammoysa tet asaaku keenik iyyan
Diggaluk Yallak meesita mari saayah (amaanah) yan aracal yanin
Jannootaa kee daroorih addal yanin
Sarak ‘Sundus’ deqsita cariiriy xabcinii kee ‘Istabraqh’ deqsita cariiriy gibdi saritan sittâ fan afkanuk
Tonnaah kaadu Jannatti agabuy ‘curral-qeyni’ deqsita keenih rihmisne
Kay addal caxâ mixuk kulli qaynat esseritan keenik yaggiriqqeeh yanbaxeemih meesik amaanah anuk (saayah anuk)
Jannat addal raba ma-tammoysan (Yallak meesitta moominiin kinnuk) naharsi rabay addunyal tammoyseeni akke waytek. Kaadu Yalli Jaciim deqsitta giráh digaalák ken catah
Woo mattaccoo ku-Rabbi-le qaxak keenih kaxxa muxxo kinni, woo niqmat usuk kaxxa affaafa
Toysa cagalah nabiyow ku- afay Qarab-af kinnit kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk) xabbacosne usun (koros kinnuk) kassitaah, yaamineeh umaanek waasima mara yakkeenî gidah
Toysa nabiyow ken finqa qambal, diggah usun ku-finqa qambaala mara kinnoonuk
